user.title: Initial Configuration
user.description: Set initial tolerances, current temperature state, and default thermostat behavior. These values will guide the program's decision-making logic.

mf_config.title: Weekday Schedule Setup (Monday to Friday)
mf_config.description: Configure up to 4 schedule slots for weekdays. Each slot includes a start time, target temperature, and the temperature sensor to use.

ss_config.title: Weekend Schedule Setup (Saturday and Sunday)
ss_config.description: Configure up to 4 schedule slots for weekends. Each slot includes a start time, target temperature, and the temperature sensor to use.
